sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.services.listeners

Class AbstractListenerProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.services.AbstractProvider
      • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.services.listeners.AbstractListenerProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Nameable, ListenerProvider, Provider

    public abstract class AbstractListenerProvider
extends AbstractProvider
implements ListenerProvider
    An abstract implementation of ListenerProvider. This class implements the listener providing mechanism based on an underlying ClassLoader of standard Java classes. TODO doc providing process, class loading / instantiation
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell
